message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $130.  I believe it offers a lot of value and would be a great purchase for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $110.  Would you be willing to go that low?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $110 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $120?
